mental.translation[0].definitions[0].def: relating to the health or state of someone’s mind
mental.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The centre provides help for people suffering from mental illness.
Stress has an effect on both your physical and mental health.
mental.translation[0].definitions[1].def: relating to the mind and thinking, or happening only in the mind
mental.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: You need to develop a positive mental attitude.
I tried to get a mental picture of him from her description.
mental.translation[0].definitions[2].def: thinking or behaving in a way that seems crazy or strange
mental.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: I had a mental time at the festival – there was all sorts of crazy stuff going on!
